ygData.subject: Dyes
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a question about dying my armor. Is there a website that has the dye recipes and the steps I need to take to make dyes? I found something on Allakazham
ygData.messageBody:
I have a question about dying my armor. Is there a website that has
the dye recipes and the steps I need to take to make dyes? I found
something on Allakazham but it just listed the components needed and
not what I need to do with them. I hunted in N. Karana to kill
beetles and get Plains Roots and put one at a time in a brewer along
with a water flask. I am up to 3 in brewing now LOL. But no dye. Do I
need to be putting a bottle or empty flask in there too with the
other stuff? And does anybody know what color Plains Dye is? Thanks
in advance for your help.

Enie Menieminiemoe 31 Erudite Enchantress
Lamorie Sabreblade 22 Barbarian Warrior
Lilmomma Layofhands 22 Halfling Cleric
Lorlei Kissofdeath 20 Human Shadow Knight
Onehomelysista 5 Ogre Shaman
